overview:
Titash Neogi is the Founder and C.E.O of Sievelogic Software, the makers of Bibkosh.com - a Knowledge Networking platform that enables users to connect their social and knowledge web.

Titash Neogi is responsible for the vision and overall product strategy and development of Bibkosh. Having earlier founded Sievelogic Software Technologies to help small and medium scale enterprises solve their problems of findabilities, Titash started working on the concept of Bibkosh in early 2010.

Earlier in his career, Titash has worked as a Senior Software Engineer at Symantec and has extensive experience in semantic search technologies.
